title: Untangling the immune response to vaccines
author: Allessandra DiCorato
description: Researchers find key biological factors associated with efficacy of the tuberculosis vaccine, and suggest ways to further study and monitor vaccine-induced immunity.
cleaned_text: Untangling the immune response to vaccines Researchers find key biological factors associated with efficacy of the tuberculosis vaccine, and suggest ways to further study and monitor vaccine-induced immunity. December 2, 2021 Researchers find key biological factors associated with efficacy of the tuberculosis vaccine, and suggest ways to further study and monitor vaccine-induced immunity.
